name: FreshBooks
description: Integrate with FreshBooks to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Clients
tools.description: List clients in FreshBooks. Optionally search by organization name or email. Returns client names, emails, and IDs.

tools.name: Create Invoice
tools.description: Create a new invoice in FreshBooks for a client. Provide at least one line item with name and amount.

tools.name: List Invoices
tools.description: List invoices in FreshBooks. Optionally filter by status or customer. Returns invoice numbers, amounts, and dates.

tools.name: List Expenses
tools.description: List expenses in FreshBooks. Optionally filter by category or date range. Returns expense descriptions, amounts, and vendors.

tools.name: Get Profit Loss
tools.description: Retrieve the profit & loss report from FreshBooks. Specify a date range for the report period.
